error.signature: MSK broker unreachable: connection to broker failed

verdict.summary: Client cannot connect to MSK (Managed Streaming for Kafka) broker due to networking, auth, or broker health issues.

dead_ends.action: Connect to MSK from outside the VPC over the internet
dead_ends.why_fails: MSK brokers are VPC-only by default; public access requires explicit configuration and is not recommended

dead_ends.action: Reboot the MSK cluster to fix broker connectivity
dead_ends.why_fails: MSK reboots replace brokers sequentially and can cause data loss if replication is insufficient

workarounds.action: Verify security group allows inbound on Kafka ports from client
workarounds.how: Check security group allows TCP on ports 9092 (plaintext), 9094 (TLS), 9096 (SASL) from client security group

workarounds.action: Use the correct bootstrap broker string for the authentication method
workarounds.how: aws kafka get-bootstrap-brokers --cluster-arn ARN to get the correct TLS, SASL, or IAM bootstrap servers

leads_to.condition: Broker reachable but IAM authentication fails

frequently_confused_with.distinction: ElastiCache connection is for Redis/Memcached; MSK broker error is for Kafka messaging infrastructure
